targets.expr:
azure_devops_agentpool_queue_length
* on (agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info)
count (azure_devops_agentpool_agent_job)
count(max_over_time(azure_devops_agentpool_agent_job[8h]))
count(max_over_time(azure_devops_agentpool_agent_job[1w]))
count(max_over_time(azure_devops_agentpool_agent_job[4w]))

avg by(agentPoolID) (
  rate(azure_devops_stats_agentpool_builds_wait_sum[1h])
  / rate(azure_devops_stats_agentpool_builds_wait_count[1h])
)
* on(agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (max by (agentPoolID,agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info{isHosted="false"}))

max by(agentPoolID) (
  rate(azure_devops_stats_agentpool_builds_duration_sum[1h])
  / rate(azure_devops_stats_agentpool_builds_duration_count[1h])
)
* on(agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (max by (agentPoolID,agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info{isHosted="false"}))

max by(projectID) (
  rate(azure_devops_stats_project_builds_duration_sum[1h])
  / rate(azure_devops_stats_project_builds_duration_count[1h])
)
* on(agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (max by (agentPoolID,agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info))

max by (agentPoolName) (
  azure_devops_agentpool_queue_length
  * on(agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (max by (agentPoolID,agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info))
)

max by (agentPoolName, agentPoolID) (
  azure_devops_agentpool_usage
  * on(agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (max by (agentPoolID,agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info))
)

label_replace(
  ( 
    max_over_time(azure_devops_agentpool_agent_job{definitionName!="PoolMaintenance"}[6h])
    * on (agentPoolAgentID) group_left(agentPoolID,agentPoolAgentName) azure_devops_agentpool_agent_info
    * on (agentPoolID) group_left(agentPoolName) (azure_devops_agentpool_info)
  )
  , "projectID", "$1", "scopeID", "^(.+)$"
)
* on (projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info)

* 1000

sum( 
  increase(azure_devops_repository_commits[31d])
  * on (projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info{projectName="$Project"})
)

sum( 
  increase(azure_devops_repository_commits[31d])
  * on (projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info{projectName="$Project"})
) / 31

label_join(
  max by(projectID, buildDefinitionID) (
    azure_devops_stats_project_builds_duration_sum
    / azure_devops_stats_project_builds_duration_count
  )
  * on(projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info{projectName="$Project"})
  * on(buildDefinitionID) group_left(buildDefinitionName, path) (azure_devops_build_definition_info)
  , "buildDefinitionFullname", "\\",  "path", "buildDefinitionName"
)

topk(
  5,
  max by(projectID, buildDefinitionID) (
    azure_devops_stats_project_builds_wait_sum
    / azure_devops_stats_project_builds_wait_count
  )
  * on(projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info{projectName="$Project"})
  * on(buildDefinitionID) group_left(buildDefinitionName) (azure_devops_build_definition_info)
)

topk(
  5,
  max by(projectID, buildDefinitionID) (
    azure_devops_stats_project_builds_duration_sum
    / azure_devops_stats_project_builds_duration_count
  )
  * on(projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info{projectName="$Project"})
  * on(buildDefinitionID) group_left(buildDefinitionName) (azure_devops_build_definition_info)
)

sum( 
  increase(azure_devops_repository_commits[1h])
  * on (projectID) group_left(projectName) (azure_devops_project_info{projectName="$Project"})
)
